question: Many adults nowadays prefer spending their free time playing computer games.   Why do they do this?   Is this a positive or negative development?
text: In today's modern world, young people love to entertain themselves by engaging in  new activities than in the past. They prefer playing video games in their free time. This essay will discuss the reasons for this trend  and argue why it is a negative development.

Nowadays, many youngsters have inclined towards  technological advancement, specifically  computer games because these games are created with  high quality and realistic features. Moreover, due to a sudden rise in technology, they now come with  special effects and  various discount offers. Consequently, youth will probably be attracted to  virtual sports. To illustrate, in recent years, young people have become a workaholic, so they do not get much time for other activities, and adults end up spending free time  playing sports on their computers or laptops.

Critics are of the belief that the current trend of online games has many demerits. Firstly, there are no physical exercises involved in such sports. Therefore, it might create  health complications. Secondly, many games may have disturbing themes, so it likely affects  mental peace. For an instance, a recent study shows that persons, who spend most of their time enjoying  virtual plays, can suffer from  depression and  anxiety issues in the long run. Hence, some believe that this activity has  numerous disadvantages.

In conclusion, today's game industry is developing a plethora of virtual plays that make adults addicted to computer games. As a result, young people have considered them as their new hobbies. However, in my opinion, it is an individual's responsibility to spend one's free time wisely  and incorporate some outdoor athletics with virtual plays.
